title: Dupont - Adobe Commerce - Marketplace Case Study
content:
# Dupont - Adobe Commerce - Marketplace Case Study

Learn how our Magento certified professionals helped the leading operations management consulting firm Dupont to upgrade on Magento 2 and improve its online presence.


Back To Work Europe Solution B2B | Marketplace SERVICES Consulting & UX DesignGrowth SupportMarkeplace Enablement INDUSTRY Industrial Goods 1.38Average load time Revenue 53% Mobile audience Strengthened Safety Solutions With Enhanced Digital Commerce Leading Safety Tech Provider DuPont Sustainable Solutions (DSS) seeks to create a multi-vendor marketplace for safety technology solutions. Their objective is to enhance client servicing and expand their global reach by offering DSS-verified safety technology products from technology providers. DSS engaged Krish TechnoLabs to leverage their digital transformation expertise in developing a user-friendly, high-performance marketplace for vendor-client interaction. Safety isn't expensive, it's priceless. Author Unknown Challenges Addressing The loopholes Ensuring a user-friendly design that can cater to a widespread audience Coordinating and integrating multiple systems to ensure smooth operations Promoting DSS-verified solutions from vendors Engaging vendors and providing them with the necessary tools for success Effectively attracting new leads for DSS' consulting services Solution Adding The Required Blend DuPont Sustainable Solutions (DSS) sought to establish a digital marketplace to showcase safety technology solutions, enhance client engagement, and drive lead generation. Krish TechnoLabs designed and implemented a robust platform using Magento Commerce On-Premise, deployed on MS Azure. The solution featured advanced search capabilities, subscription-based access models, seamless vendor management, and intuitive UI/UX to optimize user experience. Key integrations, including Oracle Eloqua for lead data management, Braintree for secure subscription payments, and compliance tools like TrustArc and DocuSign, ensured a scalable, secure, and efficient ecosystem. This comprehensive solution empowered DSS to showcase verified solutions while fostering vendor-client interactions effectively. The Strategy Building Scalable Solutions Team Krish adopted a strategic, phased approach to execute DSS’s marketplace vision, ensuring a high-quality, scalable solution. The project began with an in-depth discovery phase, gathering business requirements and aligning technology with DSS’s objectives. Customization on Magento Commerce On-Premise enabled seamless vendor onboarding, subscription management, and advanced search capabilities. Quality assurance was embedded throughout development, ensuring performance, security, and compliance with industry standards. Strategic integrations, including Oracle Eloqua and Braintree, enhanced lead management and payment security. By combining technical expertise with a structured execution strategy, Krish TechnoLabs delivered a robust, future-ready platform that drives engagement, efficiency, and business growth for DSS. Technology Mobile First Design Understood the vision and delivered on a truly on-brand experience. Client Speaks Piyush Sinha Digital Practice "The team was able to meet all of the goals set by the company for the project. The company appreciated that the team was responsive to all of their concerns regarding updates and on the progress of the project. Besides communication, the team also trained the company in managing the project." Result Caressing organization's growth with newly launched platform Since the platform was completely new and it was for the first time it made a presence amidst an audience, there aren't any growth statistics. However, the two vital figures that clearly narrated successful implementation of the project included, mobile traffic and average load time. While the former showed 53% mobile footfall assuring responsiveness, the latter further confirmed it with page load time of 1.38 seconds. We hope that the team DSS attains new benchmarks in coming months and years.
